title: Pairing off

description: Episode number 4 of Series "Six of the best". Introduces issues concerned with living away from home, multicultural differences and male and female relationships. Carl and Theresa move in together and their Italian parents cannot accept this. Paula goes out with Gary who has a cynical approach to business and personal relationships.
